name: walnut fox badge
description:
Fox Brooch in Walnut wood. 

Measures approx. 1.8 x 2.2" (4.5 x 5cm) tall and has a lightly waxed finish. As with all wood items this piece should be treated with care. Wood grain varies from piece to piece. 

Silver plated brooch back

This brooch is made to order. Please allow three working days before posting.

name: pointer earrings
description:
Minimal Pointer earrings handmade in Sterling Silver. 

Small and simple perpendicular triangles that point away from the ear. Light and easy to wear with a subtle edge. 

They come complete with sterling silver butterfly backs.

name: hedgerow necklace no.15
description:
Hedgerow Botanical Necklace no.15

Modern plant necklace from British designer Joanna Rutter, made by hand in Sterling Silver. Part of the Hedgerow Collection - very limited edition pieces inspired by the British Countryside. With a minimal roll printed textured surface for a sophisticated finish.

The pendant measures approx. 1.4" (3.5cm) wide.

name: small mountain studs
description:
Sterling silver earrings cut and crafted by hand. 

Perfectly formed mismatched mountain studs. Each pair is unique and will vary slightly from those pictured. 

The earrings measure approx.
1 x 1cm / .4 x .4"

name: nimbus earrings
description: Little clouds of hand fabricated Sterling Silver. Each cloud comes from a different illustration so they are slightly asymmetrical, like real clouds. They have been roll-printed with a particle texture (a wonderful surface that sparkles in low light). The clouds measure approx. .4" (1cm) across. *These earrings are handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting. .

name: hedgerow on yellow silk
description: Modern silver fern necklace. Hedgerow Necklace on Silk. Hand fabricated Sterling Silver frond necklace, part of my Hedgerow collection. Very limited edition pieces inspired by the British Countryside. The pendant measures approx. 1" (2.5cm) tall, finished with a textured surface and strung on lemon yellow 100% Silk. Necklace length is 30". There's no clasp, it slips simply over your head for everyday wear. *This necklace is handmade to order, please allow one week before posting.

name: hedgerow on green silk
description: Modern flower necklace. Sterling Silver on 100% Silk. Hand fabricated Sterling Silver flower necklace, part of my Hedgerow collection. Very limited edition pieces inspired by the British Countryside. The pendant measures approx. 1" (2.5cm) tall, finished with a textured surface and strung on emerald green 100% Silk. Necklace length is 18" and is finished with a Sterling Silver lobster clasp. *This necklace is handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: fragment minimalist necklace
description: Fragment minimalist Sterling Silver necklace Modern geometric necklace hand crafted from sterling silver. The bright silver pendant has sleek squared edges and is paired with a minimal oxidised sterling silver chain. Light and easy to wear thanks to the open design. Necklace length is pictured is 18" *This necklace is handmade to order. Please allow 3-5 working days before posting.

name: mustang horse necklace
description:
Mustang

Sterling silver necklace cut and crafted by hand. Fancy sterling silver chain. Closes with a Lobster clasp.

Pendant measures approx. 
3.6 x 2cm / 1.4 x .8"

name: minimalist gold stud earrings
description: Minimal gold stud earrings made for understated everyday outfits. Hand fabricated in 9K gold. Approx. .2" (.5cm) across. These earrings have a bright brushed finish. Complete with 9K butterfly backs *These earrings are handmade to order. Please allow one week before posting

name: custom name necklace
description: Archive SALE / 20% off / Last chance to buy was £150 now £120 Custom Name Necklace. Personalized pendant made by hand in Sterling Silver. The price quoted is for a word with 5 letters or less. Please choose the appropriate word length for you from the drop-down menu. A word of five letters will measure approx 6 x 1.2" (1.5 x 3cm) The price includes a sketch of your chosen word, so that you can approve the design before cutting. You just need to include your chosen word via email after ordering. *This necklace is handcrafted to order. Please allow one week from design approval before posting.

name: bow studs
description:
Bow Earrings hand crafted in sterling silver using traditional metalsmithing techniques.

Finished with a sublte textured surface.

name: modern bloom brooch
description: This modern flower measures approx. 5 x 3cm / 2 x 1.2" and has a lightly waxed finish. As with all wood items this piece should be treated with care. Wood grain varies on piece to piece. Silver plated brooch back. *In stock, ready to post

name: bird hoops
description:
Sweet hand fabricated sterling silver hoop earrings featuring little nested birds. These hoops measure approx 1.1 x 1.1" (2.8 x 2.8cm).

The birds are finished with a modern textured finish to contrast with the polished hoop.

name: nautical loop earrings, black silver
description: Mini Nautical Loop Earrings Minimal sailor rope studs made by hand in Sterling Silver with a black oxidised finish. They measure approx. .3" (.8cm) across and come complete with sterling silver butterfly backs. *These earrings are hand crafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: vixen necklace
description: vixen fox necklace Modern motif necklace from British designer Joanna Rutter, made by hand in Sterling Silver. The simple silhouette is a perfect accent to autumn wardrobes. With a minimal roll printed textured surface for a sophisticated finish. The vixen measures approx. 1.2 x .8" (3 x 2cm) *This necklace is handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting. .

name: flora necklace
description: Flora Limited Edition of 25 pieces Sterling silver necklace cut and crafted by hand. Double chain, one dark oxidised and one bright silver. Closes with a Lobster clasp. Pendant measures approx. 2.8 x 2cm / 1.1 x .8" *This necklace is handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting..

name: everyday earrings - textured
description: Everyday Earrings Perfect earrings for everyday wear. Hand fabricated in sterling silver with a contemporary textured finish. Approx. .2" (.5cm) across. Complete with sterling silver butterfly backs. *These earrings are hand crafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: rock coral hoops
description: Rock Coral Hoops Limited Edition Design. Effortlessly cool Sterling silver hoop earrings cut and crafted by hand inspired by the rough beauty of coral. These earrings are cut from finer silver sheet and so they are particularly lightweight and easy to wear. The hoops drop approx 1.2" (3cm) from the ear. Available in a bright silver finish or an oxidised rustic finish (last image). *In stock and ready to post.

name: nautical rope ring
description: Ahoy! Simple nautical inspired rope ring. Your choice of bright silver or oxidised finish. Just contact me with your ring size and colour choice when ordering. *Rings are handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting. Price is per ring.

name: fox + forest earrings
description: Hand fabricated sterling silver fox and tree post earrings. These earrings have a subtle roll printed textured finish and come complete with sterling silver butterfly backs. They measure approx. .5" (1.3cm) tall *These earrings are handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: plant motif necklace
description:
Plant Motif Necklace hand crafted from sterling silver.

The chain measures approx. 26" and is 2/3 oxidised for a modern finish.

name: hola necklace
description:
Hola Necklace. Message Pendant in Sterling Silver.

Hola! Made by hand in Sterling Silver, this special Hola will travel with you. The hola measures approx. .6 x 1.2" (1.5 x 3cm)

Necklace length is 18".

name: nautical loop earrings
description: Minimal sailor rope studs made by hand in Sterling Silver. Polished to a bright finish these dainty earrings are perfect for everyday wear. They measure approx. .3" (.8cm) across and come complete with sterling silver butterfly backs. *These earrings are hand crafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: black branch necklace
description: Black Brach Necklace The chain measures approx. 26" and slips on. *This necklace is in stock and ready to post.

With a minimal roll printed textured surface for a sophisticated finish. The earrings measure approx .4" (1.1cm) tall *These earrings are handcrafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

Each come with a bright silver chain. Closes with a Lobster clasp. Pendant measures approx. 2.5 x 1.5cm / 1 x .6" *In stock, ready to post.

name: black branch studs
description: Black Branch Studs Modern woodland earrings in oxidised Sterling Silver. Modern branch studs made by hand in Sterling Silver. Simple asymmetric silhouettes make a natural accent to any outfit. With a minimal roll printed textured surface and a dark patina for a sophisticated finish. The earrings measure approx .4" (1.1cm) tall The pair pictured are an example piece. Each pair is unique, made individually by hand, but the overall dimensions and finish will be the same. *In stock, ready to post.

name: salut necklace
description: Salut! Hand fabricated from solid Sterling Silver this special salut will travel with you. The hello measures approx. .6 x 1.6" (1.5 x 4cm) This necklace is hand crafted to order. Please allow one week before posting.

name: bloom vinyl packaging tape
description:
Bright flower print vinyl tape to jazz up your packages, letters, cards and more. Perfect for autumn into winter mail, each 66m long roll will keep you going all season.

Price is per roll

* 50mm tall
* 66m long
* Pattern repeat every 29cm
* Professionally printed Vinyl tape to my original design.

name: bird studs
description: Silver bird motif studs. Please allow one week before posting. .
